settings.subtitle: We're proud to introduce our new personalized health technology that complements our line of dietary supplements. Our technology is built around three main products that work together to help you achieve your health goals.

settings.title: Our Glucometer
settings.content: Our compact glucometer is an essential tool for monitoring your glucose levels. It's small and portable, fitting easily into your pocket, and connects to your phone through sound technology for seamless data transfer. Its affordability and convenience encourages frequent testing, so you can stay on top of your glucose levels anytime, anywhere.

settings.title: Meet Bo
settings.content:
Say hello to your new digital health companion, BO, Curalife's comprehensive health-tracking app. This powerful tool takes note of not just your glucose levels, but also your blood pressure, food intake, water consumption, and more. BO gets to know you, your preferences, and your challenges, providing personalized recommendations to improve your health every step of the way.

Curalife's health-tracking app is more than just a tracker - it's a personal health coach. BO, your always-on, always-there digital friend, provides relevant tips, reminders, and motivational support to help you build healthy habits and stay on track.

settings.title: AI-powered remote patient monitoring service
settings.content: Get read to say goodbye to traditional healthcare and hello to Curalife's AI-powered remote monitoring - the ultimate solution for personalized care. Our real-time treatment alignment and human enabled personalized support empowers you to take control of your health, while providing valuable data for improved outcomes and reduced costs.

Our technology is set to revolutionize the way we approach health, putting the power back in patients hands. With the acquisition of Glucome we created a unique approach to health.

More than just a platform

it's a new way of life, health and wellbeing that makes healthcare a rewarding and enjoyable journey.
